name: Flow Saturation
description: Identify the saturation levels across terrain given flow paths

inputs.name: Mesh
inputs.description: Base landscape form (as a mesh) for the flow calculation

inputs.name: Flow Paths
inputs.description: The flow paths as generated by the flows component

inputs.name: Start Volume
inputs.description: The quantity of water that each path 'starts with'

inputs.name: Segment Loss
inputs.description: The decimal percent (e.g. 0.15 for 15%) of the initial volume that is lost in each segment
